subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Major League Baseball decided not to resume Game 5 of the World Series on Tuesday, meaning the Phillies, who lead 3-1 in the Series, and Rays will remain tied 2-2 for one more day.
snippet: Major League Baseball decided not to resume Game 5 of the World Series on Tuesday, meaning the Phillies, who lead 3-1 in the Series, and Rays will remain tied 2-2 for one more day.
